column2: an A.M. Eatery////The ambiance in the restaurant is clean
column4: stylish.  They serve complimentary coffee while you wait.  The staff was friendly as they took names of arriving customers
column5: and our server was friendly and competent.  When we mentioned to him that we would be sharing both items
column6: he offered to have the kitchen split the Spuds Deluxe on two separate plates for us
